about_the_game:
This item pack contains Rappy costumes, a favorite from Phantasy Star Online 2, as well as various support items that will be helpful at the start of your adventures.

▼ The following items are included in this edition
- N-Rappy Suit [Fu] (Fullset Wear)
- MTN: Idle - Rappy (Change Motions)
- MTN: Glide - Rappy (Change Motions)
- STP: Rappy - Love (Stamp)
- Premium Set (15 Days) x1
- N-Inventory +10 x2

▼ The following items will be given as a bonus when purchasing this pack.
- Salon Free Pass x1
- N-Color-Change Pass x1
- N-Enhancement Success Rate +100% x1
- Photon Chunk x35
- Monotite x20
- Dualomite x20
- Trinite x20
- B-Trigger/Ael Yellow x5
- N-Half Scape Doll x5

・ The character in the image may have some items that are not included in the pack.

・ Emotes and animations that are not included in some packs are used in the image.

・ This product can be purchased in the in-game AC Shop for 980AC.

・ The items in this pack are the same as those in the PSO2:NGS Beginners! Rappy Pack, sold in the in-game AC Shop.

・ The items obtainable through this content are exclusive to Phantasy Star Online 2 New Genesis.
　This cannot be used in other services, including the Japanese service.

・ After purchasing the content, log in to Phantasy Star Online 2 New Genesis to receive the items.
Please receive the item from Main Menu → Get Campaign Items → Purchase/Receive Benefits.

･ Phantasy Star Online 2 New Genesis is required in order to use this content.
　If the latest patch is available, please update to the latest version before using this content.

・ It may take up to 24 hours for the product to be reflected upon your first billed purchase.
If over 48 hours have passed and the product has still not been reflected, please contact us through the Phantasy Star Online 2 New Genesis Official Website.
detailed_description:
This item pack contains Rappy costumes, a favorite from Phantasy Star Online 2, as well as various support items that will be helpful at the start of your adventures.

▼ The following items are included in this edition
- N-Rappy Suit [Fu] (Fullset Wear)
- MTN: Idle - Rappy (Change Motions)
- MTN: Glide - Rappy (Change Motions)
- STP: Rappy - Love (Stamp)
- Premium Set (15 Days) x1
- N-Inventory +10 x2

▼ The following items will be given as a bonus when purchasing this pack.
- Salon Free Pass x1
- N-Color-Change Pass x1
- N-Enhancement Success Rate +100% x1
- Photon Chunk x35
- Monotite x20
- Dualomite x20
- Trinite x20
- B-Trigger/Ael Yellow x5
- N-Half Scape Doll x5

・ The character in the image may have some items that are not included in the pack.

・ Emotes and animations that are not included in some packs are used in the image.

・ This product can be purchased in the in-game AC Shop for 980AC.

・ The items in this pack are the same as those in the PSO2:NGS Beginners! Rappy Pack, sold in the in-game AC Shop.

・ The items obtainable through this content are exclusive to Phantasy Star Online 2 New Genesis.
　This cannot be used in other services, including the Japanese service.

・ After purchasing the content, log in to Phantasy Star Online 2 New Genesis to receive the items.
Please receive the item from Main Menu → Get Campaign Items → Purchase/Receive Benefits.

･ Phantasy Star Online 2 New Genesis is required in order to use this content.
　If the latest patch is available, please update to the latest version before using this content.

・ It may take up to 24 hours for the product to be reflected upon your first billed purchase.
If over 48 hours have passed and the product has still not been reflected, please contact us through the Phantasy Star Online 2 New Genesis Official Website.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel ® Core™ i3-4150
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GT430
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Soundcard (DirectX 9.0c and above)
  • Additional Notes: Monitor Resolution: 1280ｘ720 pixels or higher Only XInput controllers are supported.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel ® Core™ i9-10900
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® RTX 2070 SUPER
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Soundcard (DirectX 9.0c and above)
  • Additional Notes: Monitor Resolution: 1920ｘ1080 pixels Only XInput controllers are supported.
